body: The statistics charts on my profile page won't load at all.
body_tagged: The statistics charts on my profile page won't load at all.
title: Profile Page Statistics

replies.body: I have tried this, and it's been like this for 1 month now that the stats won't load.
replies.body_tagged: I have tried this, and it's been like this for 1 month now that the stats won't load.

replies.body: Try using Firefox. There also might be some code missing in the page, it's happened to me before when I want to get on a school email, I can't and nothing shows up. Other than that, I can't help you (not that the code thing helps).
replies.body_tagged: Try using Firefox. There also might be some code missing in the page, it's happened to me before when I want to get on a school email, I can't and nothing shows up. Other than that, I can't help you (not that the code thing helps).

replies.body: OK, Thanks for the help anyway guys :)
replies.body_tagged: OK, Thanks for the help anyway guys :)

replies.body: It isn't showing for me either and yes I know I can go to avicus.net/S3M3L/stats. I would like more stats, those on my profile, not just K/D.
replies.body_tagged: It isn't showing for me either and yes I know I can go to avicus.net/S3M3L/stats. I would like more stats, those on my profile, not just K/D.

replies.body: It seems to be an issue only with new members, you can see your statistics because you have been here over 4 - 5 months.
replies.body_tagged: It seems to be an issue only with new members, you can see your statistics because you have been here over 4 - 5 months.

replies.body: Thats ok dood. I do my best to help people out if i can.
replies.body_tagged: Thats ok dood. I do my best to help people out if i can.

reply_to.body: OK, Thanks for the help anyway guys :)
reply_to.body_tagged: OK, Thanks for the help anyway guys :)

replies.body: You are only able to see kills, deaths, kd on that, I would like to see more stats like targets, nemeses, activity, it's only shown on the profile.
replies.body_tagged: You are only able to see kills, deaths, kd on that, I would like to see more stats like targets, nemeses, activity, it's only shown on the profile.

replies.body: Thanks for pointing out the other way to view some stats. The profile stats are still not working though :(
replies.body_tagged: Thanks for pointing out the other way to view some stats. The profile stats are still not working though :(

replies.body: no worries, it should be fixed in the next update.
replies.body_tagged: no worries, it should be fixed in the next update.

replies.body: This problem is everywhere on the forums... Everybody who joined from July to August, the profile doesn't work. Only Ivy can fix it. Ingame is also a massage: "report bugs at github" (https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues) I would suggest to report the bug at github. ANd like TheRomanTrident said it would be fixed in the update.
replies.body_tagged: This problem is everywhere on the forums... Everybody who joined from July to August, the profile doesn't work. Only Ivy can fix it. Ingame is also a massage: "report bugs at github" (https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues) I would suggest to report the bug at github. ANd like TheRomanTrident said it would be fixed in the update.
